name: GrammarTips
0:
”Alexa, play Grammar Tips”
”Ask Grammar Tips to recite me a poem”
”Tell grammar tips to read me something”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: grammar tips
des:
Grammar Tips delivers a randomly selected short poem
and makes learning grammar fun and easy.
To hear a poem, simply say "Alexa, open Grammar Tips" or
"Alexa, ask grammar tips to read me a poem"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
